committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the U.S. Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of making mobile home parks for the elderly and handicapped eligible for assistance under such act.

summary.text: Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to make mobile home parks for the low-income elderly and handicapped eligible for grants under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the U.S. Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of making mobile home parks for the elderly and handicapped eligible for assistance under such act.
